metadata.Title: CVE-2014-2913 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - low
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** Incomplete blacklist vulnerability in nrpe.c in NagiosRemote Plugin Executor (NRPE) 2.15 and earlier allows remote attackers toexecute arbitrary commands via a newline character in the -a option tolibexec/check_nrpe.  NOTE: this issue is disputed by multiple parties. Ithas been reported that the vendor allows newlines as "expected behavior."Also, this issue can only occur when the administrator enables the"dont_blame_nrpe" option in nrpe.conf despite the "HIGH security risk"warning within the comments.

criterions.comment: nagios-nrpe package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
